abstract.t: This document describes the OATH algorithm for challenge-response authentication and signatures. This algorithm is based on the HOTP algorithm [RFC4226] that was introduced by OATH (initiative for Open AuTHentication) [OATH] and submitted as an individual draft to the IETF in 2006. OATH-HOTP-VARIANTS Expires - October 2008 [page 1] OCRA: OATH Challenge Response Algorithms April 2008
